column4: i seem to be having a problem running an i386 live cd, i can get to the initial stage where it shows the screen after booting, i've made sure the cd was properly made and i can start the loading process, however when i run it, it doesnt make it to the second screen, it just stops after 1 minute or so
what type of video card do you have.
basically the only thing I would suggest trying is safe graphics mode.
if that doesn't work you could also try disabling some stuff like pcmcia acpi etc... all from the boot options menu.
